ivardefs.name: reason_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the reason for the substitution of (or lack of substitution) from what was prescribed.

ivardefs.name: responsibleParty_
ivardefs.desc: The person or organization that has primary responsibility for the substitution.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: A code signifying whether a different drug was dispensed from what was prescribed.

ivardefs.name: wasSubstituted
ivardefs.desc: True if the dispenser dispensed a different drug or product from what was prescribed.

properties.desc: Indicates whether or not substitution was made as part of the dispense.  In some cases substitution will be expected but does not happen, in other cases substitution is not expected but does happen.  This block explains what substitution did or did not ha
